content.raw:
This has been tested on a Windows  setup running shots with mainline labscript on Python 3 and it works (quick edit isn't on by default in Windows 7 but you can turn it on and verify that this patch disables it as intended) and doesn't seem to cause any issues.

I'll merge on Monday if there are no objections.
content.html:
This has been tested on a Windows setup running shots with mainline labscript on Python 3 and it works (quick edit isn't on by default in Windows 7 but you can turn it on and verify that this patch disables it as intended) and doesn't seem to cause any issues.

I'll merge on Monday if there are no objections.
